messages.message:
Hi,
I am urgently looking for a .Net (CMS) Developer for a FTE position. Candidate can be based in Phx, limited travel to Denver for initial 3 months, then remote. Please let me know your interest. Either way I'll appreciate your connection and time. 
Best,
Darakshan | 602-666-6570

Hi Brian,
I looked at your profile again you are a bit senior for the developer role though skill wise it ia perfect match that this client is looking for. But I can look into presenting you & (i'll get your approval before presenting your profile to client and share details etc at that time), if you are ok with a salary range of upto $95K plus benefits for this remote position. Please let me know.
thanks,
Darakshan
